description: Post-Hardening System Audit - Comprehensive Backend Analysis
critical_gaps: Memory system endpoints are not operational
Most schemas are not properly bound to agents
repair_priorities: Deploy and activate agent endpoints, particularly /agent/forge and /agent/hal
Restore memory system functionality for agent context persistence
Fix orchestrator endpoints to enable agent coordination
Investigate backend deployment issues - most endpoints are returning 404
Fix schema-agent bindings to ensure proper contract enforcement
